class_selection_dlg.title: Choose advanced class for @hero_name@:
class_selection_dlg.never_ask: Freeze current class (@class_name@) and never ask again

AC_Misc.ATTENTION GRANDPA:
{~r}ATTENTION GRANDPA{~}

												looks like you are using an outdated version of ERA, consult your local dealer if he has a new version for you!
AC_Misc.First_Time:
{~r}Welcome to Advanced Classes Mod{~}


												It looks like this is your first time playing ACM, very good :)
												To give you the best possible experience, please read the manual at least once before you play your first game.
												ACM is a complex modification and there are many new mechanics so that even the most die-hard WoG Verteran will be surprised.
												Important information about compatible mods, the graphics settings in the HD-Launcher, the difficulty system, the class system, WoG options and changes in the magic system can all be found in the mod description.

												All right, now have fun!
AC_Misc.Hunter Table:
{~Yellow}Bonus Table for Hunter{~}

												- First Shot Ability
												- Magic Block
												- Plunder I Ability
												- Hard Training


												requires: M. Warrior and M. Adventurer
AC_Misc.Druid Table:
{~Cyan}Bonus Table for Druid{~}

												- Natural Healer
												- Hardened Skin
												- Extra Cast
												- Concentration

												requires: M. Mage and M. Adventurer
AC_Misc.Battlemage Table:
{~Orange}Bonus Table for Battlemage{~}

												- Intimidation
												- Pre-Cast
												- Extra Cast
												- Master Training I


												requires: M. Warrior and M. Mage
AC_Misc.Wisdom Specialist:
{~r}Wisdom Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 starts with Expert Wisdom and gains additional 1% crit chance per level and increases his total crit chance by 50% but his spells deal 50% less crit damage. Crit chance above 100% gets converted to crit damage.
AC_Misc.Pathfinding Specialist:
{~r}Pathfinding Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 further removes the movement costs of any rough terrain by {+%Y49%%} and all his creatures have {+%Y47} additional speed in the first battle round.
AC_Misc.Crit Damage Specialist:
{~r}Crit Damage Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 gains additional 2% crit damage per level and increases his total crit damage by 50% but has a 50% lower chance for critical spells.
AC_Misc.First Aid Specialist:
{~r}First Aid Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 has a stronger First Aid skill.
												Healing in and after combat is increased by {+%Y47%%}.
												Also all troops receive {+%Y48%%} additional HP in combat.
												After level 20, heals one additional squad after combat.
AC_Misc.Diplomacy Specialist:
{~r}Diplomacy Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 has a stronger Diplomancy skill.

												Chance to attract {+%Y48%%}.
												Number of creatures {+%Y49%%}.
												Reduced hiring costs {+%Y50%%}.
AC_Misc.Nobility Specialist:
{~r}Nobility Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 has a {%Y48%%} stronger Nobility skill. For every hero level 3% more creatures will be available to recruit in town.
AC_Misc.Warfare Specialist:
{~r}Warfare Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 has a stronger Warfare skill.

												+1 Attack and Defense for every 7 levels
												+1 damage above hero level 10
												+1 combat speed above hero level 20
AC_Misc.Summoning Earth Specialist:
{~r}Summoning Earth Specialist{~}

												If %Z-1 summons Earth Elements during combat, he has a chance that some of them stay and join his army after combat.
AC_Misc.Cure Specialist:
{~r}Cure Specialist{~}

												Casts Cure with increased effekt, doubles Cure Master effect. Starts with +2 Spell Power.
AC_Misc.Specialist 2:
{~r}%Z-3 Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 has increased sight radius per hero level and {1%} additional chance for random events to happen. Discovered events have a higher value.
AC_Misc.Economy Specialist:
{~r}Economy Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 contributes 350 gold and {%Y50} random resources per day to your kingdom.
AC_Misc.Magic Arrow Specialist:
{~r}%Z3 Specialist{~}

												 %Z-1s %Z3 damage is increased by 50%.
												 Can also cast one additional %Z3 for every @casts@ heroes level.

												 Currently {~r}%Y16{~} extra casts.
AC_Misc.Fire Wall Specialist:
{~r}%Z3 Specialist{~}

												 %Z-1s %Z3 damage is doubled.
												 Can also cast one additional %Z3 for every @casts@ heroes level.

												 Currently {~r}%Y16{~} extra casts.
AC_Misc.Elemental Specialist:
{~r}%Z3 Magic Specialist{~}

												%Z-1s %Z3 Spells deal 15% more damage.
												Also has a {~r}%Y16%%{~} chance to cast an additional %Z3 spells.
												Up to {~r}%Y17{~} times per battle.
AC_Misc.Bless Specialist:
{~r}Bless Specialist{~}

												Casts Bless with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit.

												%Z-1s Bless will increase the damage of %Z-2 units by additional {~r}%Y16{~} points.

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Curse Specialist:
{~r}Curse Specialist{~}

												Casts Curse with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit.

												%Z-1s Curse will decrease the damage of %Z-2 units by additional {~r}%Y16{~} points.

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Bloodlust Specialist:
{~r}Bloodlust Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 casts Bloodlust with increased effect:

												+{~r}%Y17{~} for 1-2 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y18{~} for 3-4 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y19{~} for 5-6 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y16{~} for 7-8 level creatures

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Stoneskin Specialist:
{~r}Stone Skin Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 casts Stone Skin with increased effect:

												+{~r}%Y17{~} for 1-2 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y18{~} for 3-4 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y19{~} for 5-6 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y16{~} for 7-8 level creatures

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Haste Specialist:
{~r}Haste Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 casts Haste with increased effect:

												+{~r}%Y17{~} for 1-2 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y18{~} for 3-4 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y19{~} for 5-6 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y16{~} for 7-8 level creatures

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Precision Specialist:

												%Z-1 casts Precision with increased effect:

												+{~r}%Y17{~} for 1-2 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y18{~} for 3-4 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y19{~} for 5-6 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y16{~} for 7-8 level creatures

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Weakness Specialist:
{~r}Weakness Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 casts Weakness with increased effect:

												+{~r}%Y17{~} for 1-2 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y18{~} for 3-4 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y19{~} for 5-6 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y16{~} for 7-8 level creatures

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Prayer Specialist:
{~r}Prayer Specialist{~}

												%Z-1 casts Prayer with increased effect:

												+{~r}%Y17{~} for 1-2 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y18{~} for 3-4 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y19{~} for 5-6 level creatures
												+{~r}%Y16{~} for 7-8 level creatures

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.Slayer Specialist:
{~r}Slayer Specialist{~}

												Casts Slayer with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit.

												%Z-1s Slayer will increase the attack of %Z-2 units by additional {~r}%Y16{~} points.

												Receives one additional spell cast at hero level 20 and level 40.
AC_Misc.play_with_10_skills:
{~r}Greetings Hero!{~}

												You have choosen the 10 secondary skills option
												nice :)

												Please use 10-Skill-Plugin from Igrik and disable (Secondary Skill Scrolling Mod) if enabled, the {~DodgerBlue}Faerie Dragon{~} will take care of the rest.

												Points needed to reach master are increased to {@Master@} and for grandmaster level to {@Grandmaster@}. As usual, each master skill gives 2 class points.

												Let's go!
AC_Misc.New Level: %Z4, you advanced to a new class!
AC_Misc.Diplomacy 1:
{Diplomacy}

												Your success attracts troops from all over the kingdom.
												Impressed by your combat skills @value@ %Z2 are willing to fight in your army for @gold@ gold.

												Do you accept?
AC_Misc.Diplomacy 2: You can't pay for all of the creatures! The %Z2 aggressively start to insult you, you kill several of the creatures, after that, the rest runs for their lives and leave some gold behind, they will never come back.
AC_Misc.Leadership 1: With Master Leadership you deal {@damage@} extra damage.
AC_Misc.Leadership 2: With Grandmaster Leadership you deal {@damage@} extra damage.
AC_Misc.Luck Bonus:
{Luck Bonus}

												The luck is on your side for this battle.
												In this battle, %Z-10 troops will have the following bonus:

												+{%Y11} %Z-1
AC_Misc.Magic Artillery 1:
{Eagle Eye}

												From a distance, %Z1's ray of magic energy hits the enemy before they can react, dealing {%Y1} damage and killing {%X3} creatures! %Z1 gains experience.
AC_Misc.Magic Artillery 2:
{Eagle Eye}

												From a distance, %Z1's ray of magic energy hits the enemy before they can react, dealing {%Y1} damage and killing one creature! %Z1 gains experience.
AC_Misc.Estates Bonus:
{Estates Bonus}

												walking over the battlefield and looking between the dead bodies %Z-10 finds:
AC_Misc.Learning 1: With the help of Learning %Z-10 learns:
AC_Misc.Learning 2: %Z-10s {~r}specialisation{~} in learning allows her to additionally learn:
AC_Misc.Learning 3:
{Learning}

												Thanks to profound learning capabilities @HeroName@ recieves an additional skill point.
AC_Misc.First Aid 1:
{First Aid}

												After the battle, %Z1 used the First Aid Tent to revive a creature!
AC_Misc.First Aid 2:
{First Aid}

												After the battle, %Z1 used the First Aid Tent to revive %Y5 creatures!
AC_Misc.First Aid 3:
{~Cyan}Natural Healer{~}

												After the battle, %Z1 Druid-ability is used to revive %Y5 creatures!
AC_Misc.Battle Heal: First Aid tent heals additional {@Heal@} HP
AC_Misc.Nobility Town Fail:
{Nobility}

												%Z-1, thanks to your most noble nobility skills, you nobly tell town council that recruiting more creatures is futile. Counsil members are disappointed by you
AC_Misc.Arkane Prophet:
{~r}Arcane Prophet{~}

												%Z1 focuses on the upcoming battle. While looking at the stars you are able to take a glimpse into the future. In this battle, you are certain that the following spell will deal more damage:
AC_Misc.Warcry ability: {~LimeGreen}%Z-10s Warcry reduces the HP of all enemies by %Y12 percent{~}
AC_Misc.First Shot: {~LimeGreen}%Z-10s First Shot Ability and Magic Block activated!{~}
AC_Misc.Paladin:
{Paladin Bonus}

												You get additional @Experience@ experience points.
AC_Misc.Class Sets: You lucky bastard, these creatures carried a valuable artifact with them.
AC_Misc.Spend Spell Points: Do you want to spend {%Y19} extra spell points %Z3?
AC_Misc.Cast Damage: to increase damage of your spell by {%Y2}
AC_Misc.Cast Percentage: to increase power of your spell by {%Y2}{%}
AC_Misc.Cast Stat: to increase power of your spell by {%Y2}
AC_Misc.Cast Summon: to increase health of summoned elementals by {%Y2} HP
AC_Misc.Failed Spend Spell Points: Your speciality will not make difference for this spell cast right now
AC_Misc.Red Dragon Flame: Red Dragon Flame Tongue adds {~r}@damage3@{~} fire damage to the attack.
AC_Misc.Ray Damage: Through Disruption Ray your attack deals additional {@damage@} damage.
AC_Misc.Prayer Damage: You deal additional {@damage@} holy damage against undead creatures.
AC_Misc.Landmine Damage: Your creature lost a leg. -{@damage@} speed for the rest of the battle.
AC_Misc.Landmine Damage 2: The mine deals fatal damage to the stack!
AC_Misc.Fortune Steal 1: You steal {5 attack} from your enemy.
AC_Misc.Fortune Steal 2: You steal {5 defense} from your enemy.
AC_Misc.Fortune Steal 3: You steal {2 speed} from your enemy.
AC_Misc.Fortune Steal 4: You steal {4 damage} from your enemy.
AC_Misc.Animate leech: You consume the living to restore your health.
AC_Misc.Mirth Damage: Through improved Mirth you deal {@damage@} extra damage.
AC_Misc.Ice Spells: Your ice spells are so cold they {slow your enemies permanently}.
AC_Misc.Earth Spells: The force of your earth spells is so strong they penetrate the skin of your enemy {reducing their defence permanently}.
AC_Misc.Fire Spells: Your fire spells burn so hot that they {set your enemies on fire}.
AC_Misc.Lightning Spells: Your lightning spells hit with such force that {your enemies are in a state of shock}.
AC_Misc.Burn Damage: Your enemies burn in agony and take additional {~r}@damage@{~} fire damage.
AC_Misc.Obstacle cast: Your knowledge of magic allows you to cast again.
AC_Misc.Prepare for Battle:
{Prepare for Battle}

												%Z-10 sight allows to spot enemies from afar, seeing every one of their moves. This gives time to prepare for the upcoming battle.
												In this battle, troops will have the following bonus:

												+{%Y11} %Z-1
AC_Misc.Eagle Eye Set:
{Vision of the Eagle Set Bonus}

												%Z-10 new learned spells also increase Spell Power by:
AC_Misc.Cornucopia Set:
{Cornucopia Set Bonus}

												walking over the battlefield and looking between the dead bodies %Z-10 finds:
AC_Misc.Elemental Set:
{Elemental Set Bonus}

												%Z-10 gains additionally experience points required for the next level:
AC_Misc.Battle Mages Set:
{Battle Mages War Dress Set Bonus}

												Learning from the battle %Z-10 collects a battle trophy:
AC_Misc.Statesman's Medal Bonus:
{Statesman's Medal Bonus}

												After successfully clearing this creature bank the Statesman's Medal increases your gold reward by {@gold@} gold.
AC_Misc.Bonus_Table_Class_Sets:
{~r}Class Set Bonus{~}												
												{~r}Warrior{~} Set: +{%Y10%%} physical crit
												{~DodgerBlue}Mage{~} Set: +{%Y11%%} magical crit
												{~LimeGreen}Adventurer{~} Set: +{%Y12%%} growth
AC_Misc.Bonus Table 3: Class Experience and class point table:
AC_Misc.Bonus Table 11: Each Master level gives +2 class points for the respective class.
AC_Misc.Polarity_Boots_Bonus:
{Boots of Polarity}

												The boots have absorbed enough magic energy during this combat to increase your movement by +250 points!
AC_Misc.Scout_Attack1: For your victory you gain 1 attack!
AC_Misc.Scout_Defense1: For your victory you gain 1 defense!
AC_Misc.Scout_SP1: For your victory you gain 1 spell power!
AC_Misc.Scout_Knowledge1: For your victory you gain 1 knowledge!
AC_Misc.Summon_2: {Too many troops on the battlefield. Summon failed.}
AC_Misc.Summon_3: {There is no space to summon elementals near the hero.}
AC_Misc.Pendant_of_Recall:
{Pendant of Total Recall}

												The Pendant of Total Recall lets you remember all sort of stuff, but you already forgot what you just remembered, anyway, here are 1000 Experience points.
AC_Misc.Master_Training:
{~r}Hard Training{~}

												Skilled in the arts of fighting warriors can train their troops. All creatures receive +10% to maximum damage.
AC_Misc.Critical_Hit_1:
{~r}Critical Hit I{~}

												your troops are able to find the weak spots of your enemies. +10% chance to perform a Critical Strike with attacks.
AC_Misc.Critical_Hit_2:
{~r}Critical Hit II{~}

												your troops are able to find the weak spots of your enemies. +20% chance to perform a Critical Strike with attacks.
AC_Misc.Elite_Soldier:
{~r}Elite Soldier{~}

												endless training and an unmatched discipline makes your troops feared fighters. All creatures receive +20% to maximum damage.
AC_Misc.Endure_Retaliation:
{~r}Endure Retaliation{~}

												Attack is the best defense, your troops know how to strike hard and aviod counterattacks. -50% damage from all retaliations.
AC_Misc.Commander_1:
{~r}Commander{~}

												Inspiried by your combat skills, your Commander learns from the best. +20% to all combat stats for your Commander and Henchmen.
AC_Misc.Extra_Cast_1:
{~r}Extra Cast I{~}

												Years of training in the Arkane arts allow you to cast 1 additional time during combat.
AC_Misc.Elemental_Resistance_1:
{~r}Magic Pierce{~}

												Your spells are able to break any magic immunity. -15% (-25% with GM) Magic Resistance for enemies. Additional practice with elemental magic gives you a certain resistance agains these spells. -20% damage from spells.
AC_Misc.Extra_Cast_2:
{~r}Spell Grandmaster{~}

												Devoting your whole life to the Arcane arts you gain the ability to perform 1 extra cast per battle round.
AC_Misc.Arkane_Prophet:
{~r}Arcane Prophet{~}

												By looking in the future you are able to see which spells are favored by the gods. Arkane Prophets will cast certain spells with increased damage.
AC_Misc.Channeling:
{~r}Channeling{~}

												Focus and concentration allow you to cast spells with increased effect when having equal or more than your maximum spell points. Channeled spells are cast with +15 Magic Strength or deal +15% damage.
AC_Misc.Plunder_1:
{~r}Plunder I{~}

												Heroes with the Plunder ability can pick up gold, resources and artifacts without loosig movement points. Flaggin mines and taking creature banks is also free.
AC_Misc.Horsemaster:
{~r}Lord{~}

												Heroes with the Lord titel gain gold when capturing towns, they also increase the amount of available creatures to hire in that town.
AC_Misc.Plunder_2:
{~r}Plunder II{~}

												Heroes with the Plunder ability can pick up gold, resources and artifacts without loosig movement points. Flaggin mines and taking creature banks is also free. With Plunder II taking fights also costs no movement.
AC_Misc.Landlord_1:
{~r}Grandlord{~}

												Heroes with the Landlord titel gain gold when capturing towns, they also increase the amount of available creatures to hire in that town.
AC_Misc.Strength_Numbers:
{~r}Strength in Numbers{~}

												Grandmaster Adventurer gain additional troops every week on every occupied slot in the heroes army.
AC_Misc.Coordinated_Attack:
{~r}Coordinated Attack{~}

												The troops in an Adventurers army deal +1 additional damage for every unit in the stack.
AC_Misc.Coordinated_Damage: Your coordinated attack deals {@damage@} bonus damage.
AC_Misc.First_Shot:
{~r}First Shot{~}

												All your ranged troops act first in battle.
AC_Misc.Magic_Block:
{~r}Magic Block{~}

												Surprise attacks leaves your enemies in fear, while your troops are prepared for any battle. All your creatures have 100% Magic Resistance against all hostile spells in the first battle round.
AC_Misc.Precast:
{~r}Pre-Cast{~}

												A devastating and unavoidable spell hits your enemies before they can react. This spell costs no spell points.
AC_Misc.Intimidation:
{~r}Intimidation{~}

												An intimidating warcry reduces the life off all enemies by 10%.
AC_Misc.Natural_Healer:
{~r}Natural Healer{~}

												Druids are able to heal one additional stack after combat. Does not require First Aid tent.
AC_Misc.Natural_Resistance:
{~r}Natural Resistance{~}

												Over time Druids have developed a natural resistance against all physical attacks. They reduce 4*Hero level of damage points from all attacks.
AC_Misc.Concentration:
{~r}Concentration{~}

												This special Druid ability allows to transfer active buffs on your troops to the next combat. Up to 3 spells can be transfered. Transfered spells only last 1 battleround.
AC_Misc.Warrior_Description:
{~r}Warrior Class{~}

												Fight, destroy, conquer. Power is everything and strength is a must to achieve the state of power. And strength is not in numbers, but in fighting skill and willpower. You will have impossibly strong army, maiming enemies with a single blow while shaking off any hit taken like a scratch.
AC_Misc.Mage_Description:
{~r}Mage Class{~}

												Weaken you enemies, bless your allies, blast to pieces anyone you want, everything is possible for a mage. Shock those who think they're brave, block those who think they're fast, curse those who think they're strong, explode those who're fool enough to flock. Alter the battlefield; with immense flexibility of magic you can be creative and it will pay off, or you can be straightforward and implode vitals of everything that moves.
AC_Misc.Adventurer_Description:
{~r}Adventurer Class{~}

												What does strength mean when there're no people to fight for you? What does magic mean if you can't afford even a simple spell? Does it matter how strong you're if you get stuck in the swamp? For adventurers, simple rules do not apply. Locate resources where other will not, gather soldiers when others are not wise enought to do so, change your rules as you go, bind adventure map to your cause. Smother enemies with your numerous army before they can call to arms.
AC_Misc.Battlemage_Description:
{~r}Battlemage Class{~}

												Those who can't ignore neither might nor magic will eventually learn how to use them both succefully. Decades of fighting made you realize how valuable it is to overwhelm your opponents and ways of doing so. Your magic will surprise, your warcry will make enemies falter.
AC_Misc.Hunter_Description:
{~r}Hunter Class{~}

												Hunt down animals, hunt down enemies, everything is your prey. Long and numerous hunting sessions turned you into a quick and agile killer, merciless. You surrounded your prey, you negated any unusual moves, first strike is all that matters, wounded prey can't retaliate. And your results are surprising.
AC_Misc.Druid_Description:
{~r}Druid Class{~}

												You've used your wits, you've worked for brighter future, but you can't save them all. No amount of diplomacy can solve that. Yet you always have searched for a way to protect everything what is precious to you. You were searching for years and found nothing; the answer always lied before you: Nature. It opened it's secrets to you, it taught you how to be as everlasting as it is, as durable, and it taught you magic. March with your immortal army to your dream: peace.
AC_Misc.No_advance:
{~r}Advanced Classes Mod{~}

												You don't have advanced in any class so far.
AC_Misc.Bonus_Level: They receive the following bonus skills:
AC_Misc.Eagle_Eye_Spell:
{Eagle Eye Skill}

												Through eagled-eyed observation, %Z1 gains +{@value@} Spell Power and is able to learn:
AC_Misc.Play_10_skills:
{~red}10 Secondary Skills{~}

												Activation of this option requires the {10-SSkill} mod to be enabled. This will allow your hero to learn 10 instead of the only 8 secondary skills. Class points needed to reach master level are increased to {@Master@} and for grandmaster level to {@Grandmaster@}. As usual, each master skill gives 2 class points. For various reasons, having more than 10 secondary skills is not supported in the Advanced Classes mod.
AC_Misc.Play_Classic_Skin:
{~red}Classic Skin{~}

												Reverts the new class skill icons back to the looks from version 1.04. Choose as you like. ACM is the first heroes 3 mod with a skin pack thanks to {Sandris}.
AC_Misc.Play_Spell_Trainer:
{~red}Spell Trainer{~}

												Level up your magic! Using Spells in combat will make them more effective. Spell Trainer is a super fun modification which makes the use of spells and magic to a unique experience. To keep balance your Magic Strength will be reduced by 25%. There are serveral rules and mechanics that you need to know when playing with Spell Trainer. For example not every class has the same chance to level up spells during combat. For furhter informations check out the help file in your mod folder.
AC_Misc.Play_Spell_Duration:
{~red}Alternative Spell Duration{~}

												This mod uses a different formula to calculate how long spells lasts on creatures. A feature often asked for in the forums and implemented by {AlfwithCake}. Usually you can ignore spell duration once your spell power reaches 5 or more, which is reached after one game week.

												The new formula for spell duration is (spellpower+13)/8, rounded down.
												Collar of Conjuring gives 5 effective SP
												Ring of Conjuring gives 10 effective SP
												Cape of Conjuring gives 15 effective SP
												Ring of the Magi gives 100 effective SP
												Grandmaster Sorcery gives extra 10 effective SP.
AC_Misc.Play_Easier_Class:
{~red}Easier Classes{~}

												Play with bonus class points. This option makes it easier to reach Master and Grandmaster level by providing {5} extra class points for all classes. One point is given for every two level starting at level 20 until level 30.
AC_Misc.Necromancy_Text: Choose what creatures you want to raise with Necromancy
AC_Misc.Necromancy_Creature_3: Walking Deads, requires Expert Necromancy value down to 10%
AC_Misc.Necromancy_Creature_5: Wights, requires Master Necromancy value down to 7%
AC_Misc.Necromancy_Creature_15: Vampires, requires Grandmaster Necromancy value down to 2%
AC_Misc.Necromancy_Creature_16: Liches, requires Grandmaster Necromancy value down to 2%
AC_Misc.Necromancy_Creature_17: Black Knights, requires Grandmaster Necromancy value down to 1%

AC_Spells.Magic_Arrow_0:
{~%Z6}%Z5 Magic Arrow{~}

												Causes a bolt of magical energy to strike the selected stack.
AC_Spells.Land_Mine_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Land Mine{~}

												Randomly places {%Y6} landmines on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  It inflicts damage to any stack walking over it.
AC_Spells.Fire_Wall_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Fire Wall{~}

												Places wildfire on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster. Any stacks passing through the wall take damage.
AC_Spells.Fire_Ball_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Fireball{~}

												Causes the selected target to burst into flames, inflicting fire damage to the target and any adjacent stacks.
AC_Spells.Inferno_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Inferno{~}

												Causes a huge blast of fire to strike the selected target.  Don't be near this when it goes off!
AC_Spells.Armageddon_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Armageddon{~}

												Rains {~r}fire{~} down upon the battlefield, damaging all stacks.
AC_Spells.Fire_Shield_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Fire Shield{~}

												The Fire Shield envelops one allied unit with burning fire. Any unit attacking trough the Fire Shield in close combat suffers 10% {(+%Y29)} of the inflicted damage as fire damage.
AC_Spells.Fire_Protection_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Protection from Fire{~}

												Protects all stacks, reducing damage received from Fire spells by {%Y31%%}.
AC_Spells.Fire_Protection_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Protection from Fire{~}

												Protects the selected stack, reducing damage received from Fire spells by {%Y31%%}.
AC_Spells.Sacrifice_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Sacrifice{~}

												Destroys an allied living creature group in order to resurrect a dead group.  Number of resurrected creatures depends on the caster's spell power and the health of the destroyed stack.
AC_Spells.Curse_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Curse{~}

												Causes all enemy stacks to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat {-(%Y42)}.
AC_Spells.Curse_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Curse{~}

												Causes one enemy stack to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat {-(%Y42)}.
AC_Spells.Bloodlust_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Bloodlust{~}

												Increases hand-to-hand attack rating inflicted by all allied stacks by {%Y43} points.
AC_Spells.Bloodlust_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Bloodlust{~}

												Increases hand-to-hand attack rating inflicted by an allied stack by {%Y43} points.
AC_Spells.Misfortune_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Misfortune{~}

												Reduces luck of all enemy stacks by {-%Y52}.
AC_Spells.Misfortune_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Misfortune{~}

												Reduces luck of an enemy stack by {-%Y52}.
AC_Spells.Slayer_0:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Slayer{~}

												Increases attack rating inflicted by a stack by {+%Y55} points, when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras, Phoenixes, Devils, Angels and Titans.

												{%Y79%%} Chance for Crushing Blow.
												Crushing Blow will significantly reduce Attack (-5), Defence (-5) or Speed (-3) of any level 7 creature.
AC_Spells.Slayer_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Slayer{~}

												Increases attack rating inflicted by a stack by {+%Y55} points, when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras, Phoenixes, Devils and Angels.
AC_Spells.Slayer_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Slayer{~}

												Increases attack rating inflicted by a stack by {+%Y55} points, when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras and Phoenixes.
AC_Spells.Slayer_3:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Slayer{~}

												Increases attack rating inflicted by a stack by {+%Y55} points, when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras and Phoenixes.
AC_Spells.Frenzy_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Frenzy{~}

												Selected troop intentionally lowers its defence to {0} to increase the ferocity of its attack. Attack rating is increased by {%Y7%} of the sacrificed defence.
AC_Spells.Berserk_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Berserk{~}

												Target and all stacks in a 2 hex radius will randomly attack the nearest stack, be it ally or foe.
AC_Spells.Berserk_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Berserk{~}

												The targeted stack will randomly attack the nearest stack, be it ally or foe.
AC_Spells.Remove_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Remove Obstacle{~}

												Removes obstacle of the caster's choice from the battlefield.
AC_Spells.Fire_Element_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Summon %Z7 Elemental{~}

												Summons a stack of powerful %Z7 Elementals with a total of {%Y10} HP and a strong Fire-Shield enchantment.
AC_Spells.Lightning_0:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Lightning Bolt{~}

												Causes a bolt of lightning to strike the selected stack.

												Your lightning spells hit with such force that your enemies are in a state of shock.
												Shocked enemies have a higher chance to be hit critical {+10%} and take more damage from critical strikes {+20%}.
AC_Spells.Lightning_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Lightning Bolt{~}

												Causes a bolt of lightning to strike the selected stack.
AC_Spells.Chain_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Chain Lightning{~}

												Fires a bolt of lightning at the selected stack which then travels to the nearest adjacent stack, inflicting half damage before traveling to the next adjacent stack, again inflicting half damage, etc.
AC_Spells.Destroy_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Destroy Undead{~}

												Attempts to destroy all undead creatures on the battlefield.
AC_Spells.Air_Shield_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Air Shield{~}

												Shields all allied stacks, reducing the amount of damage received from ranged attacks by {%Y28%%}.
AC_Spells.Air_Shield_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Air Shield{~}

												Shields an allied stack, reducing the amount of damage received from ranged attacks by {%Y28%%}.
AC_Spells.Air_Protect_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Protection from Air{~}

												Protects all of your stacks, reducing damage received from Air spells by {%Y30%%}.
AC_Spells.Air_Protect_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Protection from Air{~}

												Protects your stack, reducing damage received from Air spells by {%Y30%%}.
AC_Spells.Magic_Mirror_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Magic Mirror{~}

												Reflects targetted against affected ally hostile spells towards a random enemy creature {%Y36%%} of the time.
AC_Spells.Precision_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Precision{~}

												Increases attack rating of all ranged allied stacks by {+%Y44} points. Only affects ranged troops.
AC_Spells.Precision_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Precision{~}

												Increases attack rating of ranged allied stack by {+%Y44} points. Only affects ranged troops.
AC_Spells.Disrupting_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Disrupting Ray{~}

												Reduces the selected enemy stack's defense strength {-%Y47}. A single enemy may be targeted multiple times by this spell.
AC_Spells.Fortune_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Fortune{~}

												Increases luck of all allied troops by {+%Y51}.
AC_Spells.Fortune_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Fortune{~}

												Increases luck of an allied troop by {+%Y51}.
AC_Spells.Haste_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Haste{~}

												Increases speed of all allied stacks by {+%Y53} points.
AC_Spells.Haste_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Haste{~}

												Increases speed of an allied stack by {+%Y53} points.
AC_Spells.Counterstrike_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Counterstrike{~}

												All allied stacks will retaliate against {%Y58} additional attacks each round.
AC_Spells.Counterstrike_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Counterstrike{~}

												One allied stack will retaliate against {%Y58} additional attacks each round.
AC_Spells.Hypnotize_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Hypnotize{~}

												Puts an enemy stack temporarily under your control.
AC_Spells.Summon_Air_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Summon %Z7 Elemental{~}

												Summons a stack of fast %Z7 Elementals with a total of {%Y10} HP.
AC_Spells.Cure_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Cure{~}

												Removes all negative spell effects and heals {%Y9} hit points of all allied stacks.
AC_Spells.Cure_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Cure{~}

												Removes all negative spell effects and heals {%Y9} of hit points of an allied stack.
AC_Spells.Ice_Bolt_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Ice Bolt{~}

												Drains the body heat from the selected enemy stack causing damage.
AC_Spells.Frost_Ring_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Frost Ring{~}

												Drains the body heat of any stacks adjacent to the target location, without inflicting damage on the target.
AC_Spells.Water_Protection_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Protection from Water{~}

												Protects all your stacks, reducing damage received from Water spells by {%Y32%%}.
AC_Spells.Water_Protection_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Protection from Water{~}

												Protects an allied stack, reducing damage received from Water spells by {%Y32%%}.
AC_Spells.Disple_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Dispel{~}

												Removes all spell effects from all stacks and magic-based terrain on the battlefield.
AC_Spells.Disple_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Dispel{~}

												Removes all spell effects from any single stack on the battlefield.
AC_Spells.Disple_3:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Dispel{~}

												Removes all spell effects from an allied stack on the battlefield.
AC_Spells.Bless_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Bless{~}

												Causes all allied stacks to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat {(+%Y41)}.
AC_Spells.Bless_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Bless{~}

												Causes an allied stack to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat {(+%Y41)}.
AC_Spells.Weakness_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Weakness{~}

												Reduces attack rating of all enemy stacks by {%Y45} points.
AC_Spells.Weakness_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Weakness{~}

												Reduces attack rating of an enemy stack by {%Y45} points.
AC_Spells.Prayer_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Prayer{~}

												Bestows a bonus to the attack rating, defense rating and speed of all allied stacks by {%Y48} points.
AC_Spells.Prayer_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Prayer{~}

												Bestows a bonus to the attack rating, defense rating and speed of an allied stack by {%Y48} points.
AC_Spells.Mirth_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Mirth{~}

												Increases morale of all allied stacks by {+%Y49} points.
AC_Spells.Mirth_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Mirth{~}

												Increases morale of an allied stack by {+%Y49} points.
AC_Spells.Forgetfulness_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Forgetfulness{~}

												Causes all ranged enemy stacks to forget to use their ranged attack in combat.
AC_Spells.Forgetfulness_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Forgetfulness{~}

												Causes ranged enemy stack to forget to use their ranged attack in combat.
AC_Spells.Forgetfulness_3:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Forgetfulness{~}

												Causes half of ranged enemy stack to forget to use their ranged attack in combat.
AC_Spells.Teleport_1:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Teleport{~}

												Teleports any allied stack to any unoccupied spot on the battlefield.
AC_Spells.Teleport_2:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Teleport{~}

												Teleports any allied stack to any unoccupied spot on the battlefield. Cannot teleport over castle walls..
AC_Spells.Teleport_3:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Teleport{~}

												Teleports any allied stack to any unoccupied spot on the battlefield. Cannot teleport over moats and castle walls.
AC_Spells.Clone_0:
{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Clone{~}

												Creates a duplicate of the selected stack. The image is dispelled if it is attacked.

												Clones creatures of level {1-%Y6}.

												When cast all clones on the battlefield grow by +{%Y65%%}.

{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Summon %Z7 Elemental{~}

												Summons a stack of supportive %Z7 Elementals with a total of {%Y10} HP.
												The presence of a summoned stack of %Z7 Elementals increases all damage dealt by 5%.

												The Elementals grow by {%Y68%%} after each summoning spell in the next battle round.

{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-8 Quicksand{~}

												Randomly places {%Y6} small patches of quicksand on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  Walking into quicksand ends a stack's movement for the turn and makes it visible to all.

{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-7 Meteor Shower{~}

{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-6 Death Ripple{~}

{~%Z6}%Z5%Z-9 Animate Dead{~}

AC_Spells.Trainer: damage increased by @damage@%! Now deals +@damage2@% damage.
AC_Spells.Trainer_Shield: {Your Shield spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@% damage reduction.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Bloodlust: {Your Bloodlust spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ attack.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Bless: {Your Bless spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ damage for allies.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Curse: {Your Curse spell has improved! Now gives -@damage@ damage for enemies.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Precision: {Your Precision spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ attack for allies.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Weakness: {Your Weakness spell has improved! Now gives -@damage@ attack for enemies.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Stoneskin: {Your Stoneskin spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ defense.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_AirShield: {Your Air Shield spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ damage reduction.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_FireShield: {Your Fire Shield spell has improved! Now returns @damage@ damage.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Haste: {Your Haste spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ speed.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Slow: {Your Slow spell has improved! Now reduces +@damage@% enemy speed.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Disrupting: {Your Disrupting Ray spell has improved! Now reduces -@damage@ defense.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Summoning: {All your Summoning spells have improved! Now summons with +@damage@ HP.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Protection: {Your Protection spells have improved! Now gives +@damage@% damage reduction.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Resurrection: {Your Resurrection spell has improved! Now resurrects +@damage@ extra HP.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Animation: {Your Animate Dead spell has improved! Now animates +@damage@ extra HP.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Ripple: {Your Death Ripple spell has improved! Now deals +@damage@% extra damage.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Destroy: {Your Destroy Undead spell has improved! Now deals +@damage@% extra damage.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Prayer: {Your Prayer spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ to all stats.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Slayer: {Your Slayer spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ to Attack.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Mirth: {Your Mirth spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ to Morale.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Sorrow: {Your Sorrow spell has improved! Now gives -@damage@ to enemy Morale.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Fortune: {Your Fortune spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@ Luck.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Misfortune: {Your Misfortune spell has improved! Now reduces -@damage@ to enemy Luck.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Frenzy: {Your Frenzy spell has improved! Now gives +@damage@% bonus attack.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_Cure: {Your Cure spell has improved! Now heales +@damage@ extra HP.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_FireWall: {Your Fire Wall spell has improved! Now deals +@damage@ extra damage.}
AC_Spells.Trainer_LandMine: {Your Land Mine spell has improved! Now deals +@damage@ extra damage.}

AC_Warmachine.Already_Bought:
You have already bought this upgrade, morron!
												I bet you would like me to upgrade your war machine to the next level, yes?

												Give me {2000} Gold and come back in one week hehe
AC_Warmachine.Next_Time: You dont want to upgrade? Why not? I'am like Donald Trump, Nobody knows more about improving war machines than I do!
AC_Warmachine.No_Ballista: How about you first BUY a Ballista before I can start working on it... damn these stupid people nowadays.
AC_Warmachine.No_Ammo: How about you first BUY an Ammo Cart before I can start improving it... you are wasting my time here.
AC_Warmachine.No_Tent: How about you first BUY a First Aid Tent before I can start upgrading it... I will now charge you double for the Upgrade.
AC_Warmachine.No_Machines: You need to have all Warmachines bought before I can start upgrading them.
AC_Warmachine.Solid_Choice_1: Solid choice, I will make you a good price:
AC_Warmachine.Solid_Choice_2: Excellent choice, I will make you friendship price:
AC_Warmachine.Solid_Choice_3: I'am happy, my best offer, I will make you a special price
AC_Warmachine.Requirement_2: And you need to have at least a basic knowledge of {%Z-3} to operate this upgrade.
AC_Warmachine.Requirement_3: And you need to have have enough class points.
AC_Warmachine.Buying_1: What do you say, do you want to buy this upgrade?
AC_Warmachine.Buying_2: Are you still interested in buying this improvement?
AC_Warmachine.Buying_3: Are you manly enough to buy this upgrade?
AC_Warmachine.Upgrade_Costs:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												%Z-2

												{%Y26} Gold, {%Y20} Wood, {%Y22} Ore, {%Y21} Mercury, {%Y23} Sulfur, {%Y24} Crystal, {%Y25} Gems

												%Z-4

												%Z-5
AC_Warmachine.Bal_Upg_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												The Ballista is affected by positive morale and has a {10%%} chance to act again in combat.
AC_Warmachine.Bal_Upg_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												This upgrade will increase the maximum number of shots by +{1} for the Ballista.
AC_Warmachine.Bal_Upg_3_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												With this upgrade, your Ballista is able to perform a fatal hit that cripples and weakens the target. The first hit to any target will always trigger the crippling blow. Each successive hit after the first has a lower chance of further weakening the target.
AC_Warmachine.Bal_Ench_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This powerful enchantment turns your arrows into exploding projectiles. Each hit also deals {25%%} damage to surrounding units.
AC_Warmachine.Bal_Ench_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This enchantment turns bullets into magic arrows. These projectiles deal additional magic damage based on your spell power.
AC_Warmachine.Bal_Ench_3_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This powerful enchantment binds the hero's magic power to the Ballista. Damage caused by the Ballista provides a chance for a powerful spell of the Hero to be cast on the target.
AC_Warmachine.Cart_Upg_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												Enlarges the Ammunition Cart so that more food and equipment can be transported. This upgrade increases the movement of the army by {100} points and increases the speed in the first combat round by +{1}.
AC_Warmachine.Cart_Upg_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												This upgrade provides a specially trained goblin to support you. This goblin is specialized in finding gold, resources and other items. It is said that he also has other abilities...
AC_Warmachine.Cart_Upg_3_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												This upgrade equips the Ammunition Cart with improved weapons for your army. +1 maximum damage for all your creatures.
AC_Warmachine.Cart_Ench_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This enchantment places a magical booby trap on the Ammunition Cart. If the Ammunition Cart is destroyed by an attack, the trap is triggered, dealing {massive magic damage} to the attacker.
AC_Warmachine.Cart_Ench_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This enchantment allows you to regenerate a small amount of your spell points after each battle.
AC_Warmachine.Tent_Upg_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												This upgrade improves the healing rate of your First Aid Tent by +{25%%} so that it can better heal wounded units.
AC_Warmachine.Tent_Upg_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												With this upgrade the healing capacity of your First Aid Tent is increased by +{500} hit points. Bigger healing capacity allows for more resurrection of killed troops during combat.
AC_Warmachine.Tent_Ench_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This First Aid Tent enchantment will allow you to remove negative status effects in addition to restoring hit points. Debuffs like Age, Rooting or Poisoned will also be cured.
AC_Warmachine.Tent_Ench_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This enchantment of the First Aid Tent magically improves the healing process, so that it can happen that additional creatures can be resurrected, which remain in the army even after the battle. Resurrecting creatures over their limit will consume healing capacity.
AC_Warmachine.Tent_Ench_3_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This powerful enchantment gives the First Aid Tent a magical aura that increases the hit points of all your living creatures on the battlefield by +{5%%}.
AC_Warmachine.All_WM_Upg_1_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												This upgrade strengthens all your war machines, making them more durable in combat. This upgrade adds {250} hit points and increases the defense by +{5} points for all war machines.
AC_Warmachine.All_WM_Upg_3_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Upgrade{~}


												Flexible and modular design allows war machines to be set up and used even in confined battlefields such as creatures banks or ships.
AC_Warmachine.All_WM_Ench_2_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This enchantment makes all war machines immune to direct damage spells.
AC_Warmachine.All_WM_Ench_3_Description:
{~r}%Z-1 Enchantment{~}


												This powerful enchantment will make your war machines emit a Magic Resistance aura. Creatures standing next to war machines will have a {15%%} chance to resists hostile magic. Standing between two war machines will double the effect.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Gold_0: A treasure chest filled with Gold.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Gold_1: You open the box and find:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Res_1: You come closer and inspect what the goblin found:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Creature_0: I found some poor creatures that are willing to join us.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Creature_1: Do you accept the creautres in your army:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Exp_0: A scroll with old knowledge, maybe there is something valuable written on it.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Exp_1: You take the scroll and read it.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Artifact_0: Looks like an artifact, I found it burried in the ground.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Artifact_1: This is indeed an artifact, you inspect it to find about the properties of the artifact:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Spell_0: You take the spell scroll and read it.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Spell_1: With the help of the scroll you are able to learn a new spell:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Skill_0: A scroll with ancient knowledge. You should read it my Master.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Skill_1: You take the scroll and read it. It contains some tricks you did not know about:
AC_Warmachine.Champions_Honor_Set_WM:
{Champions Honor Set Bonus}

												Your glory and fame are legendary all over the continent. A talented blacksmith approaches you and offers you the following upgrade for your Warmachines for free:
AC_Warmachine.Champions_Honor_Set_Skill:
{Champions Honor Set Bonus}

												The power of the set grants you an additional primary skill point.
AC_Warmachine.Glyph_of_Gal_Creatures:
{Glyph of Gallantry}

												On there search for glory a few {~Gold}@crname@{~} join @heroname@s army.
AC_Warmachine.Ammo_Cart_Extra_Descr:
Increases healing of First Aid tent after combat.
												Increases Artillery/Eagle Eye damage before combat.
												Gives +2 Spell Points after combat.
